articles.author: John Power
articles.title: As Trump makes rare visit to Malaysia, PM Anwar’s balancing act faces test - Al Jazeera
articles.description: US president’s Malaysia visit puts spotlight on Southeast Asian country’s effort to walk fine line between great powers.
articles.content: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia When US President Donald Trump lands in Malaysia for Southeast Asias headline summit this weekend, he will be delivering Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim a diplomatic cou… [+6221 chars]
